overview:
Quintin is a philosopher at his core with limitless imagination.. and a philosopher focuses on the big picture which encompasses everything comprised underneath it. These are the same qualities which make him an Entrepreneur. He sees endless possibilities and do not limit himself to one country or what others believe to be “Possible”.

Quintin is a very diverse individual. Building his first desktop computer when he was 14, began graphic work when he was 16 and wrote his first Non-disclosure agreement at 17. During that time, he launched his first website. A Sports related news site. Between 1999-2003 he did various freelance works for websites such as Be-mag.com and the former Dominancemag.com. The work entailed authorship of articles, graphic layouts, and video editing.

His objectives are simple, to logically break down what needs to be done through in-depth research & analysis, plan, then execute.
